attributes.action: Get involved to stop the depoptation of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Prime minister we the undersigned respectfully ask you to intervene in this case Mr McKinnon, who has Asperger's syndrome,Lawyers for Gary McKinnon say there is "clear, uncontradicted expert evidence" that the stress of extradition could result in psychosis and suicide. Would the government carry the weight of his death if any happens to him we the undersigned ask the PM to intervene asap

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
